summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nexus Command server management system. Backend APIs are fully functional locally, but critical infrastructure issue prevents frontend-backend integration.

critical_bugs.issue: External backend URL (https://sole-frenk-emergentnomad-f54bf780.koyeb.app) returns 404 - No active service

minor_bugs.issue: Variable 'i' was not defined in log content generation loop
minor_bugs.impact: Fixed during testing - log content now works

integration_issues.issue: Frontend configured to use external Koyeb URL instead of localhost, causing CORS errors and login failures

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix external backend URL deployment. The Koyeb URL (https://sole-frenk-emergentnomad-f54bf780.koyeb.app) returns 404 'No active service'. Backend works perfectly on localhost:8001 but is not accessible externally. This prevents all frontend-backend integration. Either fix the Koyeb deployment or update frontend to use localhost for testing.

success_percentage.frontend: 50% (UI loads correctly, but API integration fails due to backend URL issue)
